Project Description
This C# Silverlight 3 ResizeDragBehavior is a simpel implementation of resizing columns left, right, above or under a workingspace.

It allows you to drag a UIElement which expands another UIElement in either heigth or width.


The Resize Drag Behavior allows you to rezise a UIElement with another UIElement. This way you can fully control the resize element.
If you attach the behavior to an element, this element wil become "draggable", but what it really does is calculating the mousechange and adds/substracts the delta to the width/height of the selected element.

The properties of this behavior fully works with Blend. Designtime attributes have been added so picking the related element is using the elementpicker from Blend.
